Text: Why does nobody trim these roms with nds rom trimmer? I trim every NDS rom I have to save SIGNIFICANT space on my R4i 3DS cart's 2GB SD card.
@jayro83 Because it's 2012 and we have microSD cards larger than 2 GBs now. 16 GB cards are less than $10 (American) on amazon.
I'm sharing a clean ROM so that people may have the option of trimming/patching/modifying their ROM from a base source.
Thankyou. Download speed isn't bad, I will seed for awhile.
